item.title: SCANIA 124G v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | November 14, 2025

SCANIA 124G v1.0 ETS2

Standalone truck + trailer in the property
– For sale at a mod dealer
– 4 chassis
– Own interior
– Own sounds
– Lots of tuning and skins

Credits: natinho game

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: VOLVO CLASSIC v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | November 14, 2025

VOLVO CLASSIC v1.0 ETS2

The mod will have updates (where possible)*.

The mod contains:
– The three original factory cabin types (Sleeper – Globetrotter – Globetrotter XL).
– The original factory engines.
– 4×2, 6×2 (3000mm, 3200mm, 3500mm), and 6×4 (3000mm, 3200mm, 3500mm) chassis.
– Original interiors

Credits: iscar filho

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Mercedes Axor 1938 S v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | November 14, 2025

Mercedes Axor 1938 S v1.0 ETS2

Cabin and Interior: LS 1938 1998/2001 LS 1938 2002/2005 HSK (With Windows) HSK (Without Windows) Chassis: LS 1938 1998/2001 LS 1938 2002/2005 4×2 (Factory Version) 4×2 (Factory Version) 6×2 (Third Axle) 6×2 (Third Axle) Engines: LS 1938 1998/2001 LS 1938 2002/2005 Engine OM 457 LA EURO III – 380 HP – Electronic – CHIP380 Engine OM 457 LA EURO III – 380 HP – Electronic – CHIP380 Engine OM 457 LA EURO III – 400 HP – Electronic – CHIP400 OM 457 LA EURO III – 400 HP – Electronic – CHIP400 Gearbox: LS 1938 1998/2001 LS 1938 2002/2005 ZF 1650 4 + 4 Gears + Reduction (16 Speeds) / Diff: 3.83 ZF 1650 4 + 4 Gears + Reduction (16 Speeds) / Diff: 3.43 ZF 1650 4 + 4 Gears + Reduction (16 Speeds) / Diff: 4.22 Reduced ZF 1650 4 + 4 Gears + Reduction (16 Speeds) / Diff: 4.22 Reduced ZF 1650 4 + 4 Gears + Reduction (16 Speeds) / Diff: 4.75 Super Reduced ZF 1650 4 + 4 Gears + Reduction (16 Speeds) / Difference: 4.75 Super Reduced
Game Interaction
Compatible with SCS accessory DLCs (Not included);
Custom paint jobs in the manager;
Various skins from real companies
5 skin template slots. Accessories and Customizations: In the Cabin
4 Bumper variations (Paintable/Gray) (Model 1634/1938 with optional “mustache”)
1 Original paintable bumper variation
2 Fog light variations (High/Low Beam)
4 Front grille variations (New/Old) (Paintable/Gray)
3 Hood spoiler variations
4 Sun visor variations (With/Without logo) (Paintable/Gray)
3 Sun visor flame slots (2 position options)
1 Editable sun visor sign slot (2 positions)
2 Air suspension variations (4×2 and 6×2) (open and closed)
4 Realistic antenna slots (2 front/2 rear)
1 Editable window sticker
2 Rearview mirror models (original and Parallel options)
2 Michelin Man slots on the rearview mirror
2 Air conditioning variations (With and without ladder)
3 Cabin deflector variations
Accessories and Customizables: Interior
1 CB radio slot inside
2 Curtain variations
5 Cabin light variations
1 CD player slot on the dashboard
2 Bed variations
2 Control panel variations (With and without air pressure gauges)
Accessories and Customizables: Chassis
4 Exhaust variations (Original and chromed straight pipes)
2 Tank variations (Original plastic and stainless steel)
2 Rear fender variations (Original and paintable)
1 Set of original MB wheels + hubs (Including HL7 hub)
14 Rear mudguard variations (Original, painted and editable)
2 Hose support options (Original/With tank) Hydraulic)
Compatibility
Mercedes-Benz Dealership

Credits: rafael campos

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
